channel.title: Open-positions on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Open-positions on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Full-Stack Engineer
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We are hiring Full-Stack Engineers This role offers flexibility, remote work, and the chance to build meaningful solutions alongside a talented team.

item.title: Business Development
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re looking for Business Development talents to join Dwarves and work remotely. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of the software development industry, experience in developing partnerships & connections, excellent communication skills, and a never-ending passion for technology.

item.title: Marketing and Communications Specialist
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re looking for Marketing & Communications Specialists to join Dwarves and work remotely. The ideal candidate will have excellent communication skills, a strong understanding of the software development industry, and a never-ending passion for technology.
